Version_1

For [Kyla]96-kyla , whose presence in [the yoga studio]290-the yoga studio is always inspiring . Not only have [you]285-you made [my]0-i body more flexible , but also [my]0-i heart .

ONE SUNDAY , MARCH 6TH Standings : 4th place in the Metropolitan Division 19 Regular Season Games Remaining [Patrick O’Doul]97-o’doul knelt on [his]97-o’doul yoga mat , eyes closed . “ Let [your]285-you breath find its natural rhythm , ”[97-o’doul] came a soothing voice at the front of [the room]291-the room . “ Become aware of its temperature , and of the sensation of [your]285-you breath as [you]285-you exhale . ”[97-o’doul] [He]97-o’doul exhaled slowly , obeying [Ariana]98-ariana , [[the team]292-the team ’s massage therapist]293-the team ’s massage therapist and [yoga instructor]294-yoga instructor . [O’Doul]97-o’doul did n’t give a crap about yoga . [He]97-o’doul did n’t know where [his]97-o’doul chakras were , and [he]97-o’doul did n’t remember any of the names of the poses . But on game day [he]97-o’doul never objected to this mandatory hour of [Simon Says]99-simon says with the beauty at the front of [the room]291-the room . [She]98-ariana had [them]296-them holding [child]297-child ’s pose for a couple of minutes . Since [he]97-o’doul stunk at yoga , [he]97-o’doul needed to listen closely to [her]98-ariana instructions . The concentration yoga required was the best part — if [the pretty lady in the pink sports bra]298-the pretty lady in the pink sports bra was trying to twist [your]299-your body into a New Age pretzel , there was no time to worry about the opponent [you]299-your had to face down in five hours . “ As [you]299-your hold the pose , reconnect [your]299-your breathing with [your]299-your body . Notice how the breath moves through the ribcage in this pose , ”[98-ariana] [she]98-ariana suggested . “ Use each exhale to settle a little more firmly into the stretch . [We]2614-we ’re opening up the hips . . . ”[98-ariana] [Ariana]98-ariana circled among [[her]98-ariana students]300-her students , making a posture correction here and there . [She]98-ariana stopped at [O’Doul]97-o’doul ’s side , then got down on all fours . “ Hi , ”[98-ariana] [she]98-ariana whispered . When [he]97-o’doul turned [his]97-o’doul head , [he]97-o’doul met a pair of brown eyes , sparkling with mischief . “ Hi ? ”[97-o’doul] [She]98-ariana rarely began conversations during class . “ If this is too hard on [your]97-o’doul hip flexors , go back into tabletop . ”[98-ariana] “ [I]97-o’doul ’m good , ”[97-o’doul] [he]97-o’doul grunted . Christ . [The whole world]301-the whole world was focused on [his]97-o’doul weakness . Chronic muscle soreness should n’t be such a big deal . Playing through pain was a rite of hockey . “ Do [you]97-o’doul have [children]2615-children ? ”[98-ariana] [she]98-ariana whispered . “ Fuck no , ”[97-o’doul] [he]97-o’doul whispered back . “ And [I]97-o’doul never will . ”[97-o’doul] [Her]98-ariana smile did n’t falter . “ This pose is easier for [them]2615-children , because [their]2615-children limbs are shorter relative to [their]2615-children torso length . So take it easy . Let [gravity]2616-gravity do the work , okay ? And do [me]98-ariana a favor ? ”[98-ariana] “ What ? ”[97-o’doul] [He]97-o’doul ’d never had a conversation with [anyone]302-anyone when [they]303-they were both folded in two on the floor . “ Do n’t blow off [your]97-o’doul next massage appointment . [You]97-o’doul ’re making [me]97-o’doul look bad . ”[97-o’doul] Aw , [man]304-man . Ambushed in [child]297-child ’s pose . “ [I]97-o’doul ’m sorry , ”[97-o’doul] [he]97-o’doul said immediately . [The trainers]306-the trainers wanted [him]97-o’doul to have some massage therapy for [his]97-o’doul hip . “ Did n’t mean to mess up [your]97-o’doul schedule . ”[98-ariana] [She]98-ariana shook [her]98-ariana head . “ It ’s okay . [You]97-o’doul ’ll show up this time , right ? ”[98-ariana] “ Sure , ”[97-o’doul] [he]97-o’doul promised , because it was hard to think up a decent excuse when [you]307-you were sweating over [your]307-you yoga mat . [Ari]204-ari gave [him]97-o’doul one more killer smile and got up , moving on to correct [another player]308-another player ’s posture . [He]97-o’doul watched [her]204-ari go , then felt guilty about missing [his]97-o’doul appointments and also for checking out [her]204-ari perfect ass . Twenty minutes later , after yoga , [he]97-o’doul was ambushed a second time . But not by [Ari]204-ari . “ How ’s the hip ? ”[204-ari] [Nate Kattenberger]101-nate asked , [his]101-nate towel draped around [his]101-nate neck . [He]310-the team ’s young owner sure did n’t have any trouble holding [Ari]204-ari ’s poses , and always took a spot in the very front row . “ [I]97-o’doul ’m good . Feeling stronger , ”[97-o’doul] [O’Doul]97-o’doul lied . “ Glad to hear it . [I]312-the billionaire think [we]2617-we can beat [Boston]8-boston tonight , ”[312-the billionaire] [the billionaire]312-the billionaire said , wiping sweat off [his]312-the billionaire forehead with a towel . [He]312-the billionaire was wearing spandex shorts and a T - shirt reading , Move [Your]313-your Asana . “ Two game points tonight could really set [us]2617-we up for the weekend . ”[312-the billionaire] As if [O’Doul]97-o’doul did n’t already know that . “ [We]2617-we ’ll make it happen , ”[97-o’doul] [he]97-o’doul vowed . “ [I]101-nate think [you]97-o’doul will , ”[101-nate] [Nate]101-nate agreed . [O’Doul]97-o’doul hoped so . [They]314-they needed a third place finish in the Metropolitan division to be guaranteed a play - offs spot . If [they]314-they ended up in fourth place , [they]314-they might squeak into the last spot . It was possible . But , as [O’Doul]97-o’doul ’s team - issued phone told [him]97-o’doul every time [he]97-o’doul pulled it out of [his]97-o’doul pocket , [their]314-they play - offs spot was not a lock . [Kattenberger]101-nate ’s sophisticated model projected [their]314-they chances at 81 percent . There was no room for error . And tonight ’s game meant a lot because [Boston]8-boston was one of [the other Eastern teams in contention for those last couple of slots]315-the other eastern teams in contention for those last couple of slots . [They]314-they were so close . So fucking close [he]97-o’doul could taste it . “ Get some rest before the game , ”[101-nate] [Nate]101-nate suggested , squeezing [his]97-o’doul forearm . [O’Doul]97-o’doul fought the instinct to shake off [the big boss]316-the big boss ’s casual touch . “ Will do , ”[97-o’doul] [he]97-o’doul agreed , knowing it was a lie . [He]97-o’doul ’d go back to [the hotel]317-the hotel and lie down for a while . But sleep would elude [him]97-o’doul the same way it did on every game day . “ See [you]101-nate tonight , ”[97-o’doul] [he]97-o’doul said . [Nate]101-nate gave [him]97-o’doul one more nod and walked away . * * * Eight hours later , [the fans]318-the fans roared as [Boston]8-boston made another attempt on goal . [O’Doul]97-o’doul watched from the bench , feeling grim . The most grueling part of [his]97-o’doul job was n’t the hockey game , or the constant travel . And it was n’t the fighting , or the stitches and bruises . It was the dread . Sitting on the bench between shifts , it sunk low in [his]97-o’doul belly . It was heavy , like lead . And each time [he]97-o’doul vaulted over the wall it rose up in [his]97-o’doul throat like bile . If [any team ’s enforcer]319-any team ’s enforcer ever told [you]320-you [he]97-o’doul never felt dread , [that man]321-that man was lying . [No human]322-no human could put [his]322-no human body in the path of a six - three scrapper ’s fist three or four times a week without anticipating the pain . Tonight ’s fight had been pre - arranged in the worst possible way , too . [[The other team]323-the other team ’s enforcer]324-the other team ’s enforcer — [a dick by the name of [Trekowski]103-trekowski]325-a dick by the name of trekowski — had called [him]97-o’doul out last night on social media . On fucking Twitter . Maybe [O’Doul]97-o’doul wo n’t wimp out on fighting [me]0-i tomorrow night . # AGuyCanHope # BabySayYes . Of all the dick moves [O’Doul]97-o’doul had witnessed , [this one]326-this one took the trophy . [He]97-o’doul had n’t responded , because [he]97-o’doul did n’t even have Twitter . [He]97-o’doul did n’t tweet . Or twat . Whatever . [[The team]292-the team ’s publicist]328-the team ’s publicist — [Georgia]104-georgia — had responded on [his]97-o’doul behalf . [He]328-the team ’s publicist ’d approved a pithy little quote for [the Bruisers]102-the bruisers ’ Facebook page : [Someone]329-someone punched [me]0-i on the interwebs ? [he]328-the team ’s publicist ’d supposedly replied . Funny , [I]0-i did n’t feel a thing . [He]328-the team ’s publicist had to admit it was a clever response . A hockey fight was supposed to have purpose . Usually , a fight was payback for a cheap shot that endangered [one of [[his]97-o’doul guys]331-his guys]330-one of his guys . Other times , the brawl was meant to fuel an ongoing rivalry , rallying [the team]292-the team and changing the energy of a game . Fights were n’t supposed to start because [some bonehead]333-some bonehead wanted to flex [his]333-some bonehead shiny personality on social media . And [they]334-they sure as hell were n’t supposed to be fueled by a lie . [O’Doul]97-o’doul had never ducked a fight in [his]97-o’doul life . But [he]97-o’doul ’d missed the last game against [Boston]8-boston on account of a procedure on a tendon in [his]97-o’doul wrist . Thankfully , and with the help of the best medical attention money could buy , [his]97-o’doul wrist had healed up fast . But lately [he]97-o’doul had a new problem — pain in [his]97-o’doul hip flexor muscles . It was a low - grade thing . Something to watch . But it made [him]97-o’doul feel a lot less invincible than [he]97-o’doul was used to . At thirty - two years old [he]97-o’doul was suddenly more conscious of the toll the game took on [his]97-o’doul body . And the fighting [he]97-o’doul did for [[his]97-o’doul team]335-his team made everything riskier . So much could go wrong in those violent sixty or ninety seconds . Still , the hours leading up to the fight hurt worse than a cross to the jaw . As tonight ’s game wore on , the dread got heavier . [He]97-o’doul ’d already spent the first two periods trying to make plays while simultaneously taking it easy on [his]97-o’doul hip . While trying not to appear to take it easy on [his]97-o’doul hip . And keeping the warlike mask on [his]97-o’doul goddamn face . Frankly , it was exhausting . Earlier this season [he]97-o’doul ’d had an unusually frank heart - to - heart with [[another team]336-another team ’s enforcer]337-another team ’s enforcer — [an old timer known as [the Hammer]105-hammer]338-an old timer known as the hammer . [He]105-hammer was [the nicest guy in [the world]340-the world]339-the nicest guy in the world — [the kind who wanted to buy [you]342-you a drink after [you]342-you ’d finished beating the crap out of [each other]343-each other]341-the kind who wanted to buy you a drink after you ’d finished beating the crap out of each other . Maybe it was the scotch , but that night [he]105-hammer ’d confessed how much mental energy the fights demanded of [him]105-hammer . “ [Doulie]106-doulie , ”[105-hammer] [The Hammer]105-hammer said , using [his]105-hammer nickname . “ Try some chemical courage . [I]105-hammer can share it with [you]97-o’doul now that [we]2618-we ’re not gon na match up again this season . ”[105-hammer] [He]105-hammer ’d pulled out a pill bottle and shaken eight of the tablets into [O’Doul]97-o’doul ’s palm . “ Take one of those before a game . ”[105-hammer] “ What is it ? ”[105-hammer] “ Uppers . ”[105-hammer] [Hammer]105-hammer closed [O’Doul]97-o’doul ’s hand over the pills . “ [You]97-o’doul ’ll love [’em]2619-’em . Only one a game , though , okay ? And [you]97-o’doul wo n’t get hooked . ”[105-hammer] [O’Doul]97-o’doul was n’t proud of it , but [he]97-o’doul ’d hidden those tablets in a bottle of plain aspirin . Parsing them out over the next three weeks , [he]97-o’doul ’d taken one pill before each game . The results were even better than [Hammer]105-hammer promised . The drug made [him]97-o’doul feel energetic and invincible . But then they were gone . So [he]97-o’doul ’d taken the risky step of buying a dozen more from [a guy in [a nightclub in [lower Manhattan]30-manhattan]345-a nightclub in lower manhattan]344-a guy in a nightclub in lower manhattan . For a few short weeks they provided exactly the lift [he]97-o’doul needed . When [his]97-o’doul stash was depleted again , [he]97-o’doul missed the fearlessness [they]346-they ’d granted [him]97-o’doul . But buying that shit was both embarrassing and tricky . So this month [he]97-o’doul ’d gone without . Consequently , tonight ’s game lasted eighty years . The score was still 1–1 in the third period . For what felt like the hundredth time that night , [[Patrick]97-o’doul ’s coach]347-patrick ’s coach tapped [him]97-o’doul on the back . Fifteen seconds later [he]97-o’doul leapt up for the line change . Again . And just as quickly , [the other team ’s enforcer]324-the other team ’s enforcer turned [his]97-o’doul back . [His]97-o’doul Twitter taunter would n’t ask for the fight . [The fans]318-the fans wanted it . [The teams]350-the teams wanted it . But this dick was making [everyone]2611-everyone wait . Fuck . Mind games were the worst . [They]346-they distracted [him]97-o’doul from the business of blocking shots and scoring goals . And that , of course , was the point . Now O’Doul accelerated backwards at top speed , face to face with [Adam Hartley]107-hartley , [[Boston]8-boston ’s youngest left wing]352-boston ’s youngest left wing , blocking [the kid]353-the kid ’s path and being [a general nuisance]354-a general nuisance . [The kid]353-the kid was n’t going to get a shot off if [he]353-the kid had a say in it . Meanwhile , [[his]97-o’doul man]356-his man [Castro]109-castro got the puck back on a breakaway and gave it a good try . But [[Boston]8-boston ’s goalie]357-boston ’s goalie got a lucky save and thwarted [Brooklyn]102-the bruisers ’s attempt to break the 1–1 tie . The shift ended without a score , and without incident , goddamn it . [Trekowski]103-trekowski stayed as far away as it was possible to do on a 200 foot sheet of ice . [Bastard]358-bastard . Not [all of [the league enforcers]360-the league enforcers]359-all of the league enforcers were [good guys]361-good guys like [Hammer]105-hammer . [This one]326-this one was a real piece of work — [the kind who ’d insult [[his]363-the kind who ’d insult his own mother on twitter if it made him look tougher . at thirty - two own mother]364-his own mother on Twitter if it made [him]363-the kind who ’d insult his own mother on twitter if it made him look tougher . at thirty - two look tougher . At thirty - two]363-the kind who ’d insult his own mother on twitter if it made him look tougher . at thirty - two , [Patrick]97-o’doul felt too old for this shit . TWENTY - SIX MONDAY , MARCH 28TH [Ari]204-ari slept uneasily in [Brooklyn]10-brooklyn that night . [Georgia]104-georgia had tried to convince [her]204-ari to spend the night in [[their]1907-their spare room]1908-their spare room , but [she]204-ari had n’t agreed . Instead , [she]204-ari kept [her]204-ari panic button close by , and spent half the night listening for trouble , before finally falling into a deep sleep around three thirty . [She]204-ari woke up with a start when [her]204-ari alarm went off , and felt immediately uneasy . Given all that had occurred in [her]204-ari life lately , that was n’t terribly unusual . But as [she]204-ari came to consciousness alone in [her]204-ari own bed , it was n’t Vince [she]204-ari was worried about . This morning [she]204-ari woke with an image of [Patrick]97-o’doul in [her]204-ari mind , and a tickle of worry at the base of [her]204-ari skull . Maybe it was just uncertainty about the gift [she]204-ari ’d bought [him]97-o’doul . Yesterday after [her]204-ari massage appointments ended [she]204-ari walked [Atlantic Avenue]70-atlantic avenue until [she]204-ari found what [she]204-ari was looking for — a dual coffee and espresso machine , the same model as [her]204-ari own . It made good coffee and it had never let [her]204-ari down . [She]204-ari ’d figured [she]204-ari could save [him]97-o’doul the hassle of shopping and just gift it to [him]97-o’doul . But was that weird ? [Friends]1800-friends could buy [friends]1800-friends a coffeemaker , right ? [She]204-ari ate a small breakfast in [her]204-ari pajamas at [her]204-ari kitchen table . Usually [she]204-ari used this time to meditate on what [she]204-ari wanted to accomplish with [them]292-the team . But the prickle of unease would n’t leave [her]204-ari . Before [she]204-ari left [[her]204-ari house]2769-her house , [she]204-ari picked up the pendant [Patrick]97-o’doul had given [her]204-ari . So [she]204-ari picked it back up again and put it on . The home screen of [her]204-ari Katt Phone glowed with [her]204-ari schedule for the day . Yoga class in twenty minutes , it said . Studio B. [She]204-ari slung the shopping bag containing the coffeemaker over one shoulder and left [the house]576-the house . It was a cool morning , and on [her]204-ari short walk to work , [she]204-ari felt the chill all the way to [her]204-ari bones . [Ari]204-ari loved teaching in [this bright , modern room]1918-this bright , modern room . [It]1918-this bright , modern room had high - tech sprung flooring and soft natural light . Just another day at [the office]1110-the office . * * * It was eleven o’clock before [the room]291-the room emptied again after speeches and Q & A. [Lauren]132-lauren had reported to work fifteen hours ago already . That was life in professional sports . Now [she]132-lauren faced a car ride [home]464-home to [midtown]86-midtown . At least there would be no traffic on [the FDR]87-the fdr . [She]132-lauren ’d given away [all the hired cars]2567-all the hired cars already , so [Lauren]132-lauren found [herself]132-lauren on [the Flatbush Avenue sidewalk]2568-the flatbush avenue sidewalk , tapping [her]132-lauren Katt Phone to summon [an Uber driver]2569-an uber driver . The app gave [her]132-lauren a four - minute wait . [She]132-lauren used the time to compose a monster of a to do list for tomorrow . Not only did [she]132-lauren need to play for the play - offs , but [she]132-lauren needed to check in on [the Manhattan office]2570-the manhattan office , making sure that [the place]810-the place was n’t going to seed in [her]132-lauren absence . And at some point during this fiasco [she]132-lauren ’d have to do a final revision of the senior thesis [she]132-lauren was about to turn in . Thank God [she]132-lauren ’d only had one course left before graduation , and [her]132-lauren work was almost complete . If [the Brooklyn Bruisers]619-the brooklyn bruisers wrecked [her]132-lauren odds for receiving [her]132-lauren diploma this June , [she]132-lauren would not be responsible for [her]132-lauren actions . [Nate]101-nate would n’t let that happen , [Lauren]132-lauren ’s conscience whispered . [[Her]132-lauren boss]651-her boss had made every possible accommodation these past two years as [Lauren]132-lauren struggled to get [her]132-lauren degree . [Nate]101-nate , for all [his]101-nate quirks , liked to see [[his]101-nate people]2574-his people succeed . [She]132-lauren was still mad at [him]101-nate , though , for asking this of [her]132-lauren . [The man]402-the man knew exactly why [she]132-lauren avoided [the team]292-the team , and [he]402-the man ’d put [her]132-lauren in this position anyway . “ Hi , ”[402-the man] said a voice beside [her]132-lauren . Startled , [Lauren]132-lauren whirled to find the very reason for [her]132-lauren misery standing there on [the sidewalk]676-the sidewalk , [his]402-the man rugged face regarding [her]132-lauren curiously . [Her]132-lauren stomach flipped over and then dove straight down to [her]132-lauren knees . [Mike Beacon]272-beacon in a suit had always been [her]132-lauren undoing . [His]402-the man tie was loosened already , showing [her]132-lauren a glimpse of the contrast between [his]402-the man olive skin at [his]402-the man throat and the crisp white dress shirt . A five o’clock shadow dusted the planes of [his]402-the man strong jaw , gathering in the sexy cleft of [his]402-the man chin . [She]132-lauren used to put [her]132-lauren thumb right there beneath [his]402-the man full lower lip as [she]132-lauren tugged [his]402-the man face closer for a kiss . “ [You]132-lauren okay ? ”[402-the man] [he]402-the man asked . “ Fine , thanks ! ”[132-lauren] [she]132-lauren insisted , snapping out of it . [She]132-lauren tore [her]132-lauren gaze off of [the only man [she]132-lauren ’d ever loved]2578-the only man she ’d ever loved and looked up [Flatbush]273-flatbush for the Rav4 Uber had promised [her]132-lauren . Every muscle in [her]132-lauren body was tense as [she]132-lauren waited for [the goalie]680-the goalie to just walk away . Which [he]402-the man did not do . [She]132-lauren turned and pinned [him]402-the man with what [the assistants in [the Manhattan office]2570-the manhattan office]2580-the assistants in the manhattan office termed the Lauren Glare . The laser like effect of [her]132-lauren stare made [interns]2582-interns put away [their]2582-interns phones and get back to work . It seared [incompetent messengers]2583-incompetent messengers into delivering packages in a timely fashion . It was a “ powerful and terrifying weapon , ”[132-lauren] according to [[her]132-lauren coworkers]2584-her coworkers . [Beacon]272-beacon just smiled . What [an asshole]1168-an asshole . “ Why are [you]402-the man still here ? ”[132-lauren] [she]132-lauren asked . “ Because [you]402-the man ’re standing on [a dark sidewalk]4064-a dark sidewalk at midnight ? ”[132-lauren] Seriously ? This from [a man so obviously unconcerned with [her]132-lauren wellbeing]2586-a man so obviously unconcerned with her wellbeing ? If [he]402-the man gave a damn , [he]402-the man would n’t have walked out on [her]132-lauren two years ago without an explanation . [He]402-the man would n’t have tossed [her]132-lauren heart on [the street]801-the street , stomped on it , and then vanished from [her]132-lauren life . Forty - eight hours before [she]132-lauren realized [he]402-the man was gone , [they]2588-they ’d been circling real - estate listings in the newspaper together , discussing whether [they]2588-they needed [a three - bedroom apartment]2589-a three - bedroom apartment , or whether two would be plenty . While naked . In bed . [Lauren]132-lauren did n’t need to remind [him]402-the man , though , because [she]132-lauren ’d said it all before . For weeks [she]132-lauren ’d sobbed into [his]402-the man voice mail because [he]402-the man did n’t pick up the phone . [She]132-lauren ’d begged for an explanation , wondering what [she]132-lauren ’d done wrong . There was really no point in going [there]2644-there again . “ Just do n’t , okay ? ”[132-lauren] [she]132-lauren demanded instead . “ Do n’t what ? ”[402-the man] [his]402-the man husky voice asked . Oh , for christ ’s sake . [She]132-lauren turned to face [him]402-the man , [her]132-lauren blood pressure doubling . “ Do n’t be nice . Do n’t talk to [me]132-lauren . Do n’t look at [me]132-lauren . Just stay between the pipes and guard the damn net . And leave [me]132-lauren the hell alone . ”[132-lauren] [He]402-the man swallowed , and [she]132-lauren saw a flicker of a shadow cross [his]402-the man face , but it was gone before [she]132-lauren could name the emotion . Note to self — never square off against [a fricking goalie]2591-a fricking goalie . [They]2592-they were the masters of playing it cool when [they]2592-they wanted to . [Lauren]132-lauren found [herself]132-lauren staring again , trying not to remember how easy it had been to get [him]402-the man to toss off the mask and really live . “ [Nobody]396-nobody gets [me]402-the man like [you]132-lauren do , ”[402-the man] [he]402-the man ’d whispered into [her]132-lauren ear . It had been a lie , though . Obviously . A quick tap on a car horn broke the weird spell over [her]132-lauren . [She]132-lauren turned to see [a Rav4]2593-a rav4 against the curb , [a man peering up at [her]132-lauren that matched the profile picture of [the Uber driver [she]132-lauren ’d requested]2595-the uber driver she ’d requested]2594-a man peering up at her that matched the profile picture of the uber driver she ’d requested . Thank [you]402-the man , [baby Jesus]159-jesus . Without another word [Lauren]132-lauren got into the back seat and shut the door . [She]132-lauren could n’t resist a parting glance up at [Beacon]272-beacon , though . [He]402-the man stood there , hands jammed in [his]402-the man pockets , watching [[her]132-lauren car]2596-her car pull away .
